data.title: Working for Us
data.meta_description: If you are interested in working for The Budd Group and joining our family, please check out this page on current openings with us.
data.text:
Our Commitment to Our Employees

The Budd Group is committed to building a team of great people by recruiting and hiring the most qualified, service-focused individuals to take care of our customers. We take the time to carefully review each application to ensure that we are cultivating a team and workplace that supports diverse perspectives, backgrounds, experiences and skills.

The Budd Group values and respects every individual and has created a culture that supports high ethical standards.

The Budd Group is an equal opportunity employer and provides employment based on individual capabilities and qualifications without discrimination due to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability or veteran status.
